Description.enUS:
Cunning Hero, exceptional at disrupting battles and enduring damage. Can learn Pocket Factory, Cluster Rockets, Engineering Upgrade and Robo-Goblin.

Attacks land units.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1
Opens the abilities menu and allows you to assign unused points to the Heroes' abilities.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Consumes x1.
Causes attacks to do 2 times normal damage to buildings.

Creates a factory which automatically constructs Clockwerk Goblins.

Clockwerk Goblins have 80 hit points, deal 12 - 14 damage, and explode upon death, causing up to 30 damage to nearby enemy units.
Factory lasts 40 seconds.

Clockwerk Goblins attack land units only.
Bombards an area with rockets, dealing up to 35 damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for 1.01 second.
Improves other Tinker abilities, gives 2 attack damage and increases Tinker movement speed by 10%.
Returns to normal Tinker form, losing the benefits of Robo-Goblin but once again becoming organic.
Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.

Creates a factory which automatically constructs Clockwerk Goblins. These artificial Goblins, in addition to being potent attackers, explode upon death, causing damage to nearby enemy units.

Level 1 - Explosion does 30 damage.
Level 2 - Explosion does 60 damage.
Level 3 - Explosion does 80 damage.
Factory lasts 40 seconds.

Bombards an area with rockets, stunning enemy land units for 1.01 second and damaging nearby enemy units.

Level 1 - 35 damage.
Level 2 - 65 damage.
Level 3 - 100 damage.

Enhances other Tinker abilities with each level learned:

Cluster Rockets - Larger Area.
Pocket Factory - Builds Clockwerk Goblins more quickly.
Robo-Goblin - Increases armor and Strength; enhances Demolish.

Also gives bonus damage and increases the Tinker's movement speed.

Level 1 - +2 damage, +10% movement.
Level 2 - +4 damage, +20% movement.
Level 3 - +6 damage, +30% movement.

Transforms the Tinker into a Robo-Goblin, a powerful armored form that has the following traits:

- Bonus Strength and armor.
- Use of the Demolish ability, which grants bonus damage against buildings.
- The Tinker becomes mechanical, rendering him immune to most forms of stun, most offensive spells, and several beneficial spells.

- Each point increases hit points by 25
- Each point increases hit point regeneration

- Every 3 points increase armor by 1
- Each point increases attack speed

- Each point increases mana by 15
- Each point increases mana regeneration
